name: Advozse
racialTraits: Advozse-Silver Tongue: An Advozse gains a +5 species bonus on Persuasion checks and may reroll any Persuasion check, but must accept the result of the reroll even if it is worse.

name: Aleena
racialTraits: Aleena-Small Size: As a Small creature, an Aleena gains a +5 species bonus to Stealth checks and a +1 species bonus to Reflex Defense, but takes a -5 penalty on grapple checks.

name: Aqualish
racialTraits: Aqualish-Ferocity: When reduced to half hit points or fewer, an Aqualish gains a +2 species bonus on melee attack rolls and damage rolls until the end of the encounter.

name: Arkanian
racialTraits: Arkanian-Darkvision: An Arkanian ignores concealment caused by darkness.
Arkanian-Genetic Memory: An Arkanian gains a +2 species bonus on Knowledge (life sciences) checks.

name: Arkanian Offshoot
racialTraits: Arkanian Offshoot-Resilient Physiology: An Arkanian Offshoot gains a +2 species bonus to Fortitude Defense.

name: Balosar
racialTraits: Balosar-Toxic Breath: As a standard action, a Balosar may emit toxic gas; creatures adjacent to the Balosar take a -2 penalty on attack rolls until the end of the Balosar's next turn.

name: Barabel
racialTraits: Barabel-Reptilian Ferocity: When reduced to half hit points or fewer, a Barabel gains a +2 species bonus on attack rolls and damage rolls until the end of the encounter.

name: Bith
racialTraits: Bith-Musical Savant: A Bith gains a +5 species bonus on Perform checks.
Bith-Fragile: A Bith takes a -2 species penalty to Fortitude Defense.

name: Blood Carver
racialTraits: Blood Carver-Battle Rage: When a Blood Carver takes damage, it gains a +2 species bonus on melee damage rolls until the end of its next turn.

name: Bothan
racialTraits: Bothan-Bothan Spy Network: A Bothan may reroll any Gather Information check, but must accept the result of the reroll even if it is worse.

name: Caamasi
racialTraits: Caamasi-Pacifist Insight: A Caamasi gains a +5 species bonus on Initiative checks and may reroll Initiative checks but must accept the new result.

name: Cathar
racialTraits: Cathar-Claws: A Cathar has natural claw attacks that deal 1d4 points of slashing damage.
Cathar-Feline Agility: A Cathar gains a +2 species bonus to Reflex Defense.

name: Celegian
racialTraits: Celegian-Force Adaptation: A Celegian may use the Force even without formal Force training.

name: Cerean
racialTraits: Cerean-Binary Brain: A Cerean gains a +2 species bonus on Will Defense and may reroll any Knowledge check, but must accept the result of the reroll.

name: Chagrian
racialTraits: Chagrian-Amphibious: A Chagrian can breathe both air and water without penalty.

name: Chiss
racialTraits: Chiss-Darkvision: A Chiss ignores concealment caused by darkness.
Chiss-Tactical Training: A Chiss gains a +2 species bonus on Initiative checks.

name: Chistori
racialTraits: Chistori-Brute Strength: A Chistori gains a +2 species bonus on melee damage rolls.

name: Clawdite
racialTraits: Clawdite-Shapeshifter: As a full-round action, a Clawdite may alter its appearance to resemble any Medium humanoid.

name: Codru-Ji
racialTraits: Codru-Ji-Quad-Limbed: A Codru-Ji gains a +2 species bonus on grapple checks.

name: Dathomirian
racialTraits: Dathomirian-Force Affinity: A Dathomirian gains a +2 species bonus on Use the Force checks.

name: Dashade
racialTraits: Dashade-Force Resistance: A Dashade gains a +5 species bonus to Reflex Defense against Force powers.

name: Defel
racialTraits: Defel-Shadow Blend: A Defel gains concealment in low-light or darker conditions.

name: Draethos
racialTraits: Draethos-Resilient Hide: A Draethos gains a +2 species bonus to Fortitude Defense.

name: Dug
racialTraits: Dug-Reverse Jointed: A Dug gains a +2 species bonus on Acrobatics checks.

name: Duros
racialTraits: Duros-Expert Pilot: As natural spacers, a Duros may choose to reroll any Pilot check, but the result of the reroll must be accepted even if it is worse.

name: Elomin
racialTraits: Elomin-Frail Build: An Elomin takes a -2 species penalty to Fortitude Defense.
Elomin-Technical Savant: An Elomin gains a +2 species bonus on Mechanics checks.

name: Ewok
racialTraits: Ewok-Small Size: As a Small creature, an Ewok gains a +5 species bonus to Stealth checks and a +1 species bonus to Reflex Defense, but takes a -5 penalty on grapple checks.
Ewok-Primitive Weapons: An Ewok gains proficiency with primitive weapons.

name: Falleen
racialTraits: Falleen-Pheromones: As a standard action, a Falleen may impose a -2 penalty to Will Defense on all living creatures within 6 squares until the end of the encounter.

name: Felucian
racialTraits: Felucian-Force Sensitivity: A Felucian may use the Force even if it does not have the Force Sensitivity feat.

name: Feeorin
racialTraits: Feeorin-Intimidating Presence: A Feeorin gains a +5 species bonus on Intimidate checks.

name: Fosh
racialTraits: Fosh-Subtle Influence: A Fosh gains a +5 species bonus on Deception checks.

name: Gand
racialTraits: Gand-Third Person Speech: A Gand gains a +2 species bonus on Will Defense.
Gand-Natural Tracker: A Gand gains a +5 species bonus on Survival checks.

name: Gamorrean
racialTraits: Gamorrean-Brutal Charge: A Gamorrean gains a +2 species bonus on melee damage rolls when charging.
Gamorrean-Low Cunning: A Gamorrean takes a -2 species penalty on Will Defense.

name: Gen'Dai
racialTraits: Gen'Dai-Regeneration: A Gen'Dai automatically regains hit points equal to its level at the start of each turn unless damaged by fire or acid.

name: Geonosian
racialTraits: Geonosian-Wings: A Geonosian may fly with a speed of 6 squares (clumsy).
Geonosian-Hive Mind: A Geonosian gains a +2 species bonus on Initiative checks.

name: Givin
racialTraits: Givin-Analytical Mind: A Givin gains a +5 species bonus on Mechanics and Knowledge (physical sciences) checks.

name: Gotal
racialTraits: Gotal-Force Awareness: A Gotal gains blindsense out to 6 squares.

name: Gran
racialTraits: Gran-Three-Eyed Vision: A Gran gains a +2 species bonus to Reflex Defense.

name: Gungan
racialTraits: Gungan-Amphibious: A Gungan can breathe both air and water.
Gungan-Lucky: Once per encounter, a Gungan may reroll an attack roll, skill check, or ability check but must accept the new result.

name: Herglic
racialTraits: Herglic-Massive Build: A Herglic gains a +5 species bonus on Strength checks.

name: Houk
racialTraits: Houk-Powerful Arms: A Houk gains a +2 species bonus on melee attack rolls.

name: Human
racialTraits: Human-Versatile: A Human gains a bonus feat at 1st level.
Human-Skilled: A Human gains one additional trained skill.

name: Hutt
racialTraits: Hutt-Immense Bulk: A Hutt gains a +5 species bonus to Fortitude Defense.
Hutt-Slow: A Hutt's base speed is reduced by 2 squares.

name: Iktotchi
racialTraits: Iktotchi-Prescient Vision: An Iktotchi gains a +2 species bonus on Initiative checks and may reroll Initiative checks.

name: Ithorian
racialTraits: Ithorian-Sonic Bellow: As a standard action, an Ithorian may emit a sonic bellow that deals 1d6 sonic damage to adjacent enemies.
Ithorian-Nature Affinity: An Ithorian gains a +5 species bonus on Knowledge (life sciences) checks.

name: Jawa
racialTraits: Jawa-Scavenger: A Jawa gains a +5 species bonus on Mechanics checks to repair or jury-rig devices.

name: Kel Dor
racialTraits: Kel Dor-Atmospheric Requirement: A Kel Dor must wear a breath mask to survive in oxygen-rich atmospheres.
Kel Dor-Force Awareness: A Kel Dor gains a +2 species bonus on Use the Force checks.

name: Kaminoan
racialTraits: Kaminoan-Genetic Expertise: A Kaminoan gains a +5 species bonus on Knowledge (life sciences) checks.
Kaminoan-Fragile: A Kaminoan takes a -2 species penalty to Fortitude Defense.

name: Kaleesh
racialTraits: Kaleesh-Fearsome Reputation: A Kaleesh gains a +5 species bonus on Intimidate checks.

name: Kerkoiden
racialTraits: Kerkoiden-Military Training: A Kerkoiden gains a +2 species bonus on Initiative checks.

name: Khil
racialTraits: Khil-Force Sensitivity: A Khil may use the Force even if it does not have the Force Sensitivity feat.

name: Kissai
racialTraits: Kissai-Dark Ritualist: A Kissai gains a +2 species bonus on Use the Force checks when using dark side powers.

name: Klatooinian
racialTraits: Klatooinian-Hard Laborer: A Klatooinian gains a +2 species bonus on Endurance checks.

name: Lannik
racialTraits: Lannik-Stocky Build: A Lannik gains a +2 species bonus to Fortitude Defense.

name: Lurmen
racialTraits: Lurmen-Pacifist Resolve: A Lurmen gains a +2 species bonus to Will Defense.

name: Massassi
racialTraits: Massassi-Brutal Strength: A Massassi gains a +2 species bonus on melee damage rolls.
Massassi-Dark Side Affinity: A Massassi gains a +2 species bonus on Use the Force checks when using dark side powers.

name: Mantellian Savrip
racialTraits: Mantellian Savrip-Ability Modifiers: All Mantellian Savrips receive a +4 bonus to both their Strength and Constitution, but suffer -4 penalties to their Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma, as well as a -2 penalty to their Dexterity.

Mantellian Savrip-Large Size: As Large creatures, Mantellian Savrips take a -1 size penalty to their Reflex Defense and a -5 size penalty on Stealth checks, and they gain a +5 size bonus to their Damage Threshold. Their lifting and carrying limits are double those of Medium characters.
Mantellian Savrip-Speed: Mantellian Savrips have a base speed of 8 squares.
Mantellian Savrip-Natural Armor: Mantellian Savrips gain a +2 Natural Armor bonus to their Reflex Defense. A Natural Armor bonus stacks with an Armor bonus.

Mantellian Savrip-Natural Weapons: A Mantellian Savrip has Natural Weapons, in the form of tough claws. When making an Unarmed attack, it may choose to use its Natural Weapons, dealing 1d6 points of Slashing damage instead of normal Unarmed damage. Mantellian Savrips are always considered armed with their Natural Weapons.

Mantellian Savrip-Poison: If the Natural Weapons of a Mantellian Savrip deal damage to a living target, the target is also Poisoned. If the Poison succeeds on an attack roll (1d20 + Character Level) against the target's Fortitude Defense, the target moves -1 step along the Condition Track. A target moved to the end of the Condition Track by the Poison is Immobilized, but not Unconscious.

Mantellian Savrip-Primitive: Mantellian Savrips do not gain Weapon Proficiency (Heavy Weapons), Weapon Proficiency (Pistols), or Weapon Proficiency (Rifles) as starting Feats at first level, even if their Class normally grants them.

Mantellian Savrip-Rage: Once per day, a Mantellian Savrip can fly into a Rage as a Swift Action. While Raging, the Mantellian Savrip temporarily gains a +2 Rage bonus on melee attack rolls and melee damage rolls, but cannot use Skills that require patience and concentration (Mechanics, Stealth, Use the Force). A fit of Rage lasts for a number of rounds equal to 5 + the Mantellian Savrip's Constitution modifier. At the end of its Rage, the Mantellian Savrip moves -1 Persistent step along the Condition Track. The penalties persist until the Mantellian Savrip takes at least 10 minutes to recuperate.
Mantellian Savrip-Automatic Languages: All Mantellian Savrips can speak Savrip.

name: Miraluka
racialTraits: Miraluka-Force Sight: A Miraluka is blind but perceives the world through the Force, ignoring concealment from darkness.
Miraluka-Force Sensitivity: A Miraluka gains the Force Sensitivity feat at 1st level.
Miraluka-Conditional Bonus Feat: A Miraluka who has Use the Force as a Trained Skill gains Force Training as a bonus Feat.

name: Mon Calamari
racialTraits: Mon Calamari-Amphibious: A Mon Calamari can breathe both air and water.
Mon Calamari-Tech Savvy: A Mon Calamari gains a +2 species bonus on Mechanics checks.

name: Mrlssi
racialTraits: Mrlssi-Mercantile Instincts: A Mrlssi gains a +5 species bonus on Persuasion checks made to bargain or negotiate.

name: Nagai
racialTraits: Nagai-Cold Adaptation: A Nagai gains a +2 species bonus to Fortitude Defense against cold environments.

name: Nautolan
racialTraits: Nautolan-Aquatic: A Nautolan can breathe water and gains a swim speed equal to its base speed.
Nautolan-Tactile Awareness: A Nautolan gains blindsense out to 6 squares.

name: Nelvaanian
racialTraits: Nelvaanian-Feral Instincts: A Nelvaanian gains a +2 species bonus on Initiative checks.

name: Neimoidian
racialTraits: Neimoidian-Cowardly: A Neimoidian takes a -2 species penalty on Will Defense.
Neimoidian-Mercantile Training: A Neimoidian gains a +5 species bonus on Persuasion checks related to business.

name: Noghri
racialTraits: Noghri-Assassin Training: A Noghri gains a +2 species bonus on Stealth and Initiative checks.

name: Nosaurian
racialTraits: Nosaurian-Prehensile Tail: A Nosaurian gains a +2 species bonus on Acrobatics checks.

name: Nyriaanan
racialTraits: Nyriaanan-Winged Glide: A Nyriaanan may glide, reducing falling damage to zero if conscious.

name: Quarren
racialTraits: Quarren-Amphibious: A Quarren can breathe both air and water.
Quarren-Forceful Presence: A Quarren gains a +2 species bonus on Intimidate checks.

name: Rakata
racialTraits: Rakata-Dark Side Mastery: A Rakata gains a +2 species bonus on Use the Force checks and treats the Use the Force skill as trained.

name: Replica Droid
racialTraits: Replica Droid-Artificial Being: A Replica Droid is immune to poison and disease but cannot benefit from organic healing.

name: Rodian
racialTraits: Rodian-Keen Senses: A Rodian gains a +2 species bonus on Perception checks.

name: Ryn
racialTraits: Ryn-Natural Performer: A Ryn gains a +5 species bonus on Perform checks.

name: Sakiyan
racialTraits: Sakiyan-Aerial Hunter: A Sakiyan gains a +2 species bonus on Initiative checks while flying.

name: Selkath
racialTraits: Selkath-Amphibious: A Selkath can breathe both air and water.
Selkath-Aquatic Adaptation: A Selkath gains a +2 species bonus to Fortitude Defense.

name: Shard
racialTraits: Shard-Crystalline Body: A Shard is immune to poison and disease and does not need to breathe.

name: Snivvian
racialTraits: Snivvian-Craven: A Snivvian takes a -2 species penalty to Will Defense.
Snivvian-Opportunistic: A Snivvian gains a +2 species bonus on Deception checks.

name: Sullustan
racialTraits: Sullustan-Spatial Awareness: A Sullustan gains a +5 species bonus on Pilot checks and Initiative checks.

name: Taung
racialTraits: Taung-Warrior Culture: A Taung gains a +2 species bonus on melee attack rolls.

name: Talz
racialTraits: Talz-Cold Adaptation: A Talz gains a +5 species bonus to Fortitude Defense against cold environments.

name: Thakwaash
racialTraits: Thakwaash-Dual Brains: A Thakwaash gains a +2 species bonus to Will Defense and Reflex Defense.

name: Togruta
racialTraits: Togruta-Spatial Awareness: A Togruta gains blindsense out to 6 squares.
Togruta-Pack Instincts: A Togruta gains a +2 species bonus on Initiative checks.

name: Togorian
racialTraits: Togorian-Claws: A Togorian has natural claw attacks that deal 1d6 points of slashing damage.

name: Toydarian
racialTraits: Toydarian-Force Resistance: A Toydarian gains a +5 species bonus to Will Defense against Force powers.
Toydarian-Wings: A Toydarian may fly with a speed of 6 squares (clumsy).

name: Trandoshan
racialTraits: Trandoshan-Regeneration: A Trandoshan regains hit points equal to its level once per encounter when reduced below half hit points.
Trandoshan-Claws: A Trandoshan has natural claw attacks that deal 1d6 points of slashing damage.

name: Trianii
racialTraits: Trianii-Feline Instincts: A Trianii gains a +2 species bonus on Initiative checks.

name: Twi'lek
racialTraits: Twi'lek-Graceful: A Twi'lek gains a +2 species bonus to Reflex Defense.
Twi'lek-Persuasion Training: A Twi'lek gains a +5 species bonus on Persuasion checks.

name: Ubese
racialTraits: Ubese-Survivalist: An Ubese gains a +2 species bonus on Endurance and Survival checks.

name: Utai
racialTraits: Utai-Underground Adaptation: An Utai gains darkvision and a +2 species bonus on Perception checks underground.

name: Vahla
racialTraits: Vahla-Dark Side Affinity: A Vahla gains a +2 species bonus on Use the Force checks when using dark side powers.

name: Vurk
racialTraits: Vurk-Powerful Swimmer: A Vurk gains a swim speed equal to its base speed and a +2 species bonus on Athletics checks while swimming.

name: Weequay
racialTraits: Weequay-Stoic Resolve: A Weequay gains a +2 species bonus to Will Defense.

name: Whiphid
racialTraits: Whiphid-Arctic Hunter: A Whiphid gains a +2 species bonus on Stealth and Survival checks in cold environments.

name: Wookiee
racialTraits: Wookiee-Mighty: A Wookiee gains a +4 species bonus to Strength.
Wookiee-Endurance: A Wookiee gains a +2 species bonus to Fortitude Defense.
Wookiee-Rage: When reduced to half hit points or fewer, a Wookiee gains a +2 bonus on melee attack rolls and damage rolls until the end of the encounter.

name: Wroonian
racialTraits: Wroonian-Elongated Reach: A Wroonian gains a +2 species bonus on grapple checks.

name: Yarkora
racialTraits: Yarkora-Brute Force: A Yarkora gains a +2 species bonus on melee damage rolls.

name: Yevetha
racialTraits: Yevetha-Militaristic Culture: A Yevetha gains a +2 species bonus on Initiative checks.

name: Yuuzhan Vong
racialTraits: Yuuzhan Vong-Force Immunity: A Yuuzhan Vong is immune to the effects of Force powers.
Yuuzhan Vong-Living Technology: A Yuuzhan Vong may only use organic equipment.

name: Yuzzem
racialTraits: Yuzzem-Rage: When reduced to half hit points or fewer, a Yuzzem gains a +2 species bonus on melee attack rolls until the end of the encounter.

name: Zabrak
racialTraits: Zabrak-Irrepressible: Once per encounter, a Zabrak may ignore the effects of being stunned or dazed for one turn.
Zabrak-Battle Hardened: A Zabrak gains a +2 species bonus to Fortitude Defense.

name: Zeltron
racialTraits: Zeltron-Pheromones: A Zeltron gains a +5 species bonus on Persuasion checks.

name: Zygerrian
racialTraits: Zygerrian-Dominating Presence: A Zygerrian gains a +2 species bonus on Intimidate checks.

name: Adnerem
racialTraits: Adnerem-Fearless: An Adnerem gains a +2 species bonus to Will Defense.

name: Anzat
racialTraits: Anzat-Quey Drain: As a standard action, an Anzat may deal 1d6 damage to a helpless living creature and regain hit points equal to the damage dealt.

name: Besalisk
racialTraits: Besalisk-Four Arms: A Besalisk may wield and hold items as if it had four hands, gaining a +2 species bonus on grapple checks.

name: Besalisk (Four-Armed)
racialTraits: Besalisk (Four-Armed)-Multi-Limbed Coordination: A Besalisk may ignore the penalty for using multiple weapons.

name: Cathar (Savage)
racialTraits: Cathar (Savage)-Blood Fury: When reduced to half hit points or fewer, a Cathar gains a +2 species bonus on melee damage rolls.

name: Devaronian
racialTraits: Devaronian-Force Resistance: A Devaronian gains a +2 species bonus to Will Defense against Force powers.

name: Drall
racialTraits: Drall-Technical Aptitude: A Drall gains a +5 species bonus on Mechanics checks.

name: Echani
racialTraits: Echani-Martial Culture: An Echani gains a +2 species bonus on melee attack rolls.

name: Gossam
racialTraits: Gossam-Commercial Instincts: A Gossam gains a +5 species bonus on Persuasion checks involving trade or negotiation.

name: Ikkrukkian
racialTraits: Ikkrukkian-War Cry: As a swift action, an Ikkrukkian may grant allies within 6 squares a +1 bonus on attack rolls until the end of the encounter.

name: Karkarodon
racialTraits: Karkarodon-Aquatic Predator: A Karkarodon gains a swim speed equal to its base speed and a +2 species bonus on melee attack rolls while swimming.

name: Kiffar
racialTraits: Kiffar-Psychometry: A Kiffar gains a +2 species bonus on Use the Force checks to sense Force impressions.

name: Leporine
racialTraits: Leporine-Quick Reflexes: A Leporine gains a +2 species bonus to Reflex Defense.

name: Muun
racialTraits: Muun-Financial Savant: A Muun gains a +5 species bonus on Persuasion and Knowledge (bureaucracy) checks.

name: Nikto
racialTraits: Nikto-Hardy Physiology: A Nikto gains a +2 species bonus to Fortitude Defense.

name: Ortolan
racialTraits: Ortolan-Auditory Savant: An Ortolan gains a +5 species bonus on Perception checks involving sound.

name: Qel-Droma
racialTraits: Qel-Droma-Force Legacy: A Qel-Droma gains a +2 species bonus on Use the Force checks.

name: Rishi
racialTraits: Rishi-Glide Wings: A Rishi may glide, reducing falling damage to zero if conscious.

name: Ssi-Ruuvi
racialTraits: Ssi-Ruuvi-Energy Drain: A Ssi-Ruuvi gains a +2 species bonus on Mechanics checks involving energy weapons.

name: Ugnaught
racialTraits: Ugnaught-Industrial Expertise: An Ugnaught gains a +5 species bonus on Mechanics checks involving machinery.
